SELECT * from ( SELECT rel.ACCT_NO as acctNo, rel.ACCT_NAME as acctName, c.auth_state as authState, rel.bank_name as bankName, rel.bank_type as bankType, rel.pingan_collect_acct_id as collectAcctId, u.mobile_phone as mobilePhone, u.id as userId, u.linkman as userName, cbai.accLevel FROM ( select * from(SELECT a.TENANT_ID, a.user_info_id USER_ID, NULL auth_state FROM tenant_staff_rel a where a.TENANT_ID= #{tenantId} and a.state = 1 UNION SELECT d.TENANT_ID, d.USER_ID , d.STATE auth_state FROM tenant_user_rel d where d.TENANT_ID=#{tenantId} UNION select a.TENANT_ID,b.USER_ID,NULL auth_state from tenant_receiver_rel a,user_receiver_info b where a.receiver_id = b.id and a.TENANT_ID= #{tenantId} and b.TENANT_ID= #{tenantId}) f group by f.USER_ID ) c LEFT JOIN account_bank_rel rel on c.USER_ID=rel.USER_ID LEFT JOIN cmb_bank_account_info cbai on cbai.id=rel.acct_id LEFT JOIN user_data_info u on c.USER_ID=u.ID ) t where 1=1
AND t.userName like CONCAT('%',#{userName},'%')
AND t.mobilePhone like CONCAT('%',#{mobilePhone},'%')
and t.userId IS NOT NULL and (t.accLevel is null or t.accLevel = 0)

SELECT o.ORDER_ID AS orderId, s.CAR_DRIVER_ID AS carDriverId, s.CAR_DRIVER_MAN AS carDriverMan, s.CAR_DRIVER_PHONE AS carDriverPhone, s.PLATE_NUMBER AS plateNumber, o.SOURCE_REGION AS sourceRegion, o.DES_REGION AS desRegion FROM order_info o,order_scheduler s WHERE o.order_id = s.order_id AND o.order_state !=#{orderState} AND o.TENANT_ID =#{tenantId}
AND s.CAR_DRIVER_PHONE like CONCAT('%',#{mobilePhone},'%')
AND s.CAR_DRIVER_MAN like CONCAT('%',#{userName},'%')
ORDER BY s.DEPEND_TIME DESC

SELECT o.ORDER_ID AS orderId, s.CAR_DRIVER_ID AS carDriverId, s.CAR_DRIVER_MAN AS carDriverMan, s.CAR_DRIVER_PHONE AS carDriverPhone, s.PLATE_NUMBER AS plateNumber, o.SOURCE_REGION AS sourceRegion, o.DES_REGION AS desRegion FROM order_info_h o,order_scheduler_h s WHERE o.order_id = s.order_id AND o.order_state !=#{orderState} AND o.TENANT_ID =#{tenantId}
AND s.CAR_DRIVER_PHONE like CONCAT('%',#{mobilePhone},'%')
AND s.CAR_DRIVER_MAN like CONCAT('%',#{userName},'%')
ORDER BY s.DEPEND_TIME DESC

SELECT count( 1 ) FROM user_data_info u, pay_manager pay LEFT JOIN account_bank_rel bank ON pay.rece_acc_no = bank.pingan_collect_acct_id WHERE pay.pay_tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND u.id = pay.apply_user_id
AND pay.id IN (${lidStr}) AND ( pay.state = 0 OR pay.state = 4 )
and pay.id = ''
AND ( pay.org_id IN (${orgStr}) OR pay.org_id IS NULL OR pay.org_id = -1 )

select o.* from oa_loan o where o.user_info_id = #{oilExcDto.userId} and o.LOAN_SUBJECT = 8 and o.APP_DATE >= #{oilExcDto.createTime} and o.APP_DATE <= #{oilExcDto.updateTime} and o.TENANT_ID = #{oilExcDto.tenantId} and o.STS in (3,4,5,7) and (o.DEDUCTIBLE_STATE is null or o.DEDUCTIBLE_STATE = 0) order by o.APP_DATE asc
